Content.Text:
Tomorrow is the Starry Night Festival.
What should I do?
Attend it with someone
Do nothing

I guess I don't need to do anything
this year. I'll just do whatever.

Who should I spend Starry Night Fest
with?
Allen
Rod
Soseki
Sanjay
Neil
Tina
Michelle
Iroha
Felicity
Witch Princess
Previous
Next
Actually, I'll do nothing

I'd better ask <BLUE><CHARANAME0></BLUE> before 
I forget.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, it's you, <MYNAME>. You disturbed
my sleep. This better be important.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? You want me to spend the Starry
Night Festival with you?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm... So you want to see the stars
with me? I see.
<PAGE>
Very well. If you insist, I will grace
you with my presence.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We'll meet tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house</GREEN>.
You got it?

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! You're here
early. Did you want something from me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You want to know if we can attend
the Starry Night Festival together?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course, yes! I'm so glad you asked
me!
<PAGE>
It's the Starry Night Festival, so I was
worried I'd be attending it alone. I'm
so happy that you asked!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How about we meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> at
<GREEN>your house</GREEN>? Oh, I can't wait!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh... It's still so early. What's
wrong, <MYNAME>? You know I'm not
a morning person.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You want to attend the Starry 
Night Festival together?
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, but I'm not interested
in stuff like that, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
W-Wait! Don't look at me like that!
All right! All right! I'll go with you
for it! Please let me be with you!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew... Anyway, let's meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house</GREEN>. Sound good?
<PAGE>
Good. Well, that's that. I'm going to
catch a few more winks. See you later!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, my. If it isn't <MYNAME>. Good
morning. What brings you here at this
hour?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Starry Night Festival? You wish to
gaze at the stars with me?
<PAGE>
I see. Please allow me to check Master
Amir's schedule on that day. Please
wait.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for waiting. It seems I am
free that day. If it pleases you, I'd
be thrilled to accompany you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I shall visit you at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your home</GREEN>. I hope
we will have a wonderful time.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Yawn... What's going on? What are you
doing here so early? If it's nothing
major can it wait until later?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You want to go see the stars with
me tomorrow? Why does it have to be me?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh... Well... You know...
<PAGE>
It's not that I don't want to. I don't
mind looking at the stars. Fine, I'll go
with you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's meet up tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house</GREEN>. Well, later.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! What brings
you here so early? Did you come by to
tell me some big news?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What?! You want to go to the Starry
Night Fest and see the stars together?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sure! I wanted to go, too! Besides, if
we're going to look at the stars, we
might as well do it with someone!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's meet tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
in <GREEN>your house</GREEN>!
I'll be waiting!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, <MYNAME>. It's against the rules
to come to a girl's house so early in
the morning.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
What? You want to spend the Starry
Night Festival together?
<PAGE>
I was planning to keep tomorrow open so
I could practice my magic...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
But since you asked me out, sure.<RED>∀</RED>
Let's go see the stars together!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How about we meet tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house</GREEN>?
I better dress up.<RED>∀</RED>

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You're up early.
Did you want something from me?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Starry Night Festival? Come to think
of it, that's tomorrow isn't it? So,
you came to ask me to go with you?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I do enjoy looking at the stars. If you
don't mind, I would be honored to go
with you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let us meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house, <MYNAME></GREEN>.
I will cut my training short tomorrow.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You seem to wake
up really early! I really respect you
for that!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Starry Night Festival? <MYNAME>, you
want me to go see the stars with you?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sure! It's a special occasion, so I'll
bring you something good to eat.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Would you like to meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house, <MYNAME></GREEN>?
I can't wait!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>. What are you doing here at this
hour? Depending on your answer, I may
have to turn you into a stuffed animal.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You want to go see the stars
with me tomorrow? Well...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was getting kind of bored, so sure.
But in exchange, you'll have to be my
guinea pig for my magic experiments!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Then we'll meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house</GREEN>. Be ready
for the experiment!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

I better go ask <BLUE><CHARANAME0></BLUE>
before I forget.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>?  Why would you
come visit me so early in the morning?
Did you dream about me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, right. Tomorrow is the Starry Night
Fest. How could I forget?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I forgot to make plans to spend it
with my cute girlfriend. I'm sorry.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, be sure you don't make any
plans for tomorrow night. I'll be
escorting you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll pick you up at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house</GREEN>. Remember
to dress up, okay?

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! What are you doing at this
hour?!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, right! You beat me to it...

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was going to go to your house to ask
you to go with me to the Starry Night
Festival.
<PAGE>
But you were thinking the same thing.
That, by itself, makes me really happy.
Thanks for coming!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
How about we meet up tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house</GREEN>? I might
not be able to sleep tonight!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! What are you doing here?
Did something happen?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You want to spend tomorrow's Starry
Night Festival together?
<PAGE>
Uh...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! Is that why you came by?
What a relief!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You came running until you were short 
of breath, so I was wondering what was 
up. Don't make me worry like that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, my answer is yes, by the way.
I'm looking forward to it, too. It
only happens once a year!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How about we meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> at
<GREEN>your house</GREEN>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I really shouldn't be at my age,
but I'm really excited. It's so nice to
have a lover.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Good morning. What brings
you here at this hour?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Starry Night Festival? Yes, of
course. I would be honored to go 
together.
<PAGE>
It feels very nice to be asked like
this.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I used to work in a palace, so I had
thought that I would never be able to
spend time with my love like this.
<PAGE>
It's all thanks to you, <MYNAME>, for
building this house and for us to become
lovers. Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now then. I shall come by <GREEN>your house</GREEN>
tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I will be looking forward to it.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? What are you doing
here so early? You surprised me. What
happened?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Now that you mention it, tomorrow
is the Starry Night Festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Well, you know. I wouldn't
mind going with you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wait, what did I say? Wait, no! Geez!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm going! I wanted to go
see the stars with you! Geez...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
We'll meet up tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> at
<GREEN>your house</GREEN>! Well, that's that!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>? It's rare for
you to come at this hour.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My plans for tomorrow? I don't have
anything set.
<PAGE>
It's the Starry Night Fest tomorrow, so
I was hoping to spending it with you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I couldn't find the right time to ask
you. I'm sorry I didn't tell you sooner.
<PAGE>
To apologize, I'll try my best to
keep you entertained tomorrow.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Would it be all right to meet tomorrow
at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> at <GREEN>your house</GREEN>? I'll be
looking forward to it.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! You're up early.
What happened?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What?! You want to spend tomorrow's
Starry Night Fest with me? Yay<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, it is the Starry Night Festival,
so of course I wanted to spend it with
you. Thank you, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's meet up tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> at
<GREEN>your house, <MYNAME></GREEN>! Oh, I can't wait!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, what's the matter? It's so
early in the morning. I haven't even
done my makeup yet...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, right. Tomorrow is the Starry Night
Festival. Sure. Let's spend it
together!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's meet tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house, <MYNAME></GREEN>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Knowing you, <MYNAME>, you'll definitely
make it a wonderful night, right? I'll
be counting on you.<RED>∀</RED>

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>? What's up?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Starry Night Festival? You want to
go together?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Sure... I wanted to go with you too...

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's meet at... <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> at
<GREEN>your house</GREEN>... How's that?
Well... bye.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. It's so early,
but I'm happy you've come to see me.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You'll spend the Starry Night Festival
with me? Wonderful.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was just thinking how nice it would
be to spend the festival with you, but
I figured you'd be busy with farm work.
<PAGE>
I was debating whether or not I should
ask you. Thank you for taking the
initiative.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let us meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
at <GREEN>your house, <MYNAME></GREEN>.
I am looking forward to it.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What are you doing up
so early in the morning?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hahaha. Are you asking me out to the
Starry Night Festival? I was waiting for
you! Of course I'll be happy to go.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Starry Night Festival is special, so
I wanted to spend it with you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall we meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> at 
<GREEN>your house, <MYNAME></GREEN>? Oh, I can't wait!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You know I'm not a
morning person. What do you want?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You want to go see the stars with
me tomorrow? Well, let me think...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How can I say no to you, <MYNAME>. Sure.
Let's go together.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll be sure to show up at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> at
<GREEN>your house, <MYNAME></GREEN>.
It'll be a fun night!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

I better go ask <BLUE><CHARANAME0></BLUE>
out before I forget.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. What's up?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You want to go to the Starry Night
Festival with me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
How can I say no when my wife asks me
such an adorable request? We'll have a
date under the stars tomorrow night.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's meet up at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> <GREEN>at home</GREEN>.
It's a date, so be sure to dress up.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did you sleep
well last night?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, the Starry Night Festival tomorrow?
Of course I'll go with you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You mean like back when we were
dating?
<PAGE>
R-Right... It might be a bit
embarrassing but that might be nice,
too.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
How about we meet tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
<GREEN>at home</GREEN>? I'll be looking forward to it.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. Is something wrong?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, right. Tomorrow is the Starry Night
Festival. I totally forgot about it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sorry, sorry. I got off topic. Anyway,
sure, I'll be happy to spend it with
you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How about we meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
<GREEN>at home</GREEN>?
<PAGE>
We rarely go out together at night, so
I can't wait! Let's hold hands then.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You appear
happy today. Did something happy?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the Starry Night Festival
tomorrow? Oh, I was planning on watching
the stars with you. How about it?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's good. I'm glad you were
supportive of the idea.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then let us meet tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
<GREEN>at home</GREEN>. I hope the skies will be clear
tomorrow.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Oh, I'm so
sleepy. Huh? What's up?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do I want to do for tomorrow's
Starry Night Fest? Of course I'm going
with you! Did you make other plans?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Yeah, I thought as much. Man, you scared
me. I was wondering what if I was wrong.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>N-No, nothing! I was just talking
to myself! Don't worry about it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's meet tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>
<GREEN>at home</GREEN>. I'll be looking forward to it.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did something
happen?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
My plans for tomorrow? Oh, you mean for
the Starry Night Festival. I had
intended on spending it with you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
With the weather this cold, I'm sure
the night sky will be filled with stars
tomorrow.
<PAGE>
But be sure not to catch a cold. We'll
bundle up before heading outside
tomorrow.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
We will meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> <GREEN>at home</GREEN>. How
does that sound? I'll be looking forward
to it.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! It's so cold
today. My hands are getting numb.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? What about tomorrow's Starry Night
Festival? I'm fine, but what about your
work, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then let's go see the stars together!
<MYNAME>, I thought you might be busy
with work, so I didn't expect to go!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Let's meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> <GREEN>at home</GREEN>. How's
that? I can't wait to go!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. What is it?
It looks like you want to say something.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Haha... You wanted to see the stars with
me tomorrow? I don't mind.
<PAGE>
But there is something I want you to
buy for me in exchange.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, come on, <MYNAME>. I was just
kidding. Don't take me seriously.
<PAGE>
I can't help but tease you, <MYNAME>,
because it's so fun seeing how you
react.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
We'll meet tomorrow at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> <GREEN>at home</GREEN>.
Let's see how it turns out!

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good morning... Is something
wrong?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going to see the stars tomorrow
for the Starry Night Festival?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Sure... Thank you for asking me out...

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
How about we meet at... <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> <GREEN>at home</GREEN>?
I'll be ready for you...

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good morning. Is something
the matter?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, is this about the Starry Night
Festival? I wanted to talk to you about
that. Shall we spend it together?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's good. We only get to see the
stars shining so beautifully once a
year. I was looking forward to it.
<PAGE>
Thank you so much for asking me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
How about we meet at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE> <GREEN>at home</GREEN>?
I'll waiting for you.

We're meeting at <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>.
I'd better not forget. I can't wait
for tomorrow!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning! Isn't it cold today?
<PAGE>
Say, <MYNAME>. Don't you have something
to say to me about tomorrow's Starry
